OOC: Oh, okay, considering I shot before the red myst even started. and
Even if there was a myst making it hard to see, Wildrider's gun shoot a
spread of 8 lasers per trigger pull, so shooting blind even one of my
lasers would hit. Next time could you guys at least state you dodge them.
And Wildrider is still in the air.

Wildrider looks down on all of this chaos being created, and is a little
disapointed in the inefectivness of this attack, considering he is still
very high in the air. He soars upwards a ways, even further out of danger.
He again fires a torent of lasers at them.
